content: **crochet breakfast with bread bacon and eggs crocheted in drops paris** ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ drops design pattern no w-035-bn yarn group c -------------------------------------------------------- materials drops paris from garnstudio 50 g color no 26 dark beige 50 g color no 46 rust 50 g color no 17 off white 50 g color no 14 strong yellow 50 g color no 44 brown drops crochet hook size 4 mm / g/6 or size needed to get 22 single_crochet = width 10 cm / 4 accessories some poly stuffing for filling
